items.name: Undhiyu
items.description: A traditional Gujarati mixed vegetable dish, simmered in a rich blend of spices and herbs, featuring a medley of seasonal vegetables, accompanied by fenugreek dumplings (muthiya). It's vibrant flavors and unique preparation make it a popular dish during the winter festival of Uttarayan in Gujarat. Served with 4 puris

items.name: Shengolya
items.description: Dish from Maharashtra, where dough rings made with wholewheat flour mixed with spices are simmered in a broth made with onion, ginger, garlic and other spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Gavran Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken cooked with onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, and a mix of traditional spices and coconut. It's the use of local spices that gives it it's distinct taste, reflecting the culinary traditions of the Maharashtra region.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Street food from India. Small potato patty mixed with spices, shallow fried and then smeared with some tangy tamarind chutney and spicy green chutney, onions, coriander and spices. (2 tikkies)

items.name: Vangi Bhaat
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking rice with eggplants and a blend of spices. A flavorful and filling dish.

items.name: Mushroom Xacuti
items.description: A Goan dish that showcases the rich and aromatic flavors of Goan cuisine. It involves cooking mushrooms in a spicy and flavorful coconut-based curry, known as Xacuti masala. The masala is a blend of various spices, including poppy seeds, fennel seeds, coriander, cumin, and more, creating a delicious and fragrant dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Lamb Sorpotel
items.description: A fiery and flavorful curry hailing from Goa, featuring tender mutton cooked in a spicy masala blend of aromatic spices, vinegar and tamarind, creating a distinctive and delicious coastal dish. Often enjoyed during celebrations, it showcases the rich culinary heritage of Goan cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Cutlet Pao
items.description: Shredded chicken mixed with spices, herbs, potatoes and breadcrumbs, and then shaped it into cutlets. These cutlets are shallow-fried until golden brown. The cutlet is then placed in a pav. (2 cutlets with pao)

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Arachuvitta Sambar
items.description: A dish from the state of Kerala. Veggies cooked with lentils and tamarind and homemade samabar powder and coconut. A dish very comforting for the soul.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Ammachy's Chicken Curry
items.description: Ammachy is a term used for grandmother or elder woman in some Indian communities. The dish is based on family recipes and regional influences, but involves a flavorful blend of spices, onions, tomatoes, and coconut for a rich and aromatic curry.  As the name suggests a home-cooked, nostalgic preparation passed down through generations, highlighting the personal touch and culinary expertise of Ammachy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parthas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry.

items.name: Shahi Korma Biryani
items.description: Flavorful Indian dish that combines the richness of Shahi Korma, a creamy and aromatic curry, with the fragrant and layered preparation of biryani. In this dish, marinated and cooked chicken is layered with partially cooked basmati rice. The Shahi Korma, made with a blend of spices, yogurt, cream, and nuts, is poured over the layers before the biryani is slow-cooked, allowing the flavors to meld together.

items.name: Sofiyani Biryani
items.description: A royal and aromatic rice dish known for its rich and luxurious flavors. This biryani variant involves marinated  lamb, cooked with fragrant basmati rice and a blend of exotic spices. The preparation  includes ingredients like saffron, ghee (clarified butter), nuts, and aromatic herbs, imparting a regal and indulgent taste. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Shami Kebab
items.description: Lipsmacking street food from the northern part of India. Minced meat and chana dal mixed with different spices and ground into a smooth mixture and shapped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with green chutney on the side. (3 pieces)

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Veg Berry Pulao
items.description: A flavorful rice dish made with a mix of vegetables, aromatic spices, and dried berries. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Kid Gosht
items.description: A succulent and aromatic meat dish, showcases the harmony of flavors. The meat is slow cooked with milk and cashew in a blend of aromatic spices and topped with fried potatoes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kera Na Kebab
items.description: A delightful dish made with plantains, mixed with mashed potatoes & aromatic spices shaped into patties. These kebabs are then deep fried to golden perfection, creating a flavorful and crispy snack. (6 kebabs)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Tadkewali Dahi Bhindi
items.description: Okra cooked in yogurt and seasoned with a tempering of spices. In this preparation, okra is sautéed or fried until crispy and then combined with a spiced yogurt mixture. The tempering which involves heating oil or ghee and adding mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, and other spices, is poured over the yogurt-coated okra to enhance the flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Railway Lamb Curry
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb with a blend of aromatic spices, tomatoes, and coconut milk. The result is a rich and hearty curry that gained popularity as a staple on Indian train journeys.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rava Mini Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made with rava (semolina) and yogurt. The batter is poured into mini idli molds and steamed until the idlis are soft and fluffy. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Mulangi Sambar Rice
items.description: A South Indian dish featuring tender radish pieces cooked in a spiced lentil stew, flavored with tamarind and aromatic sambar spices. This tangy and wholesome dish is served with rice

items.name: Vendakai Sambar
items.description: A South Indian dish that features okra (vendakai) as one of its main ingredients. Sambar is a traditional South Indian lentil stew, and when prepared with okra, it adds a unique flavor and texture to the dish. The dish is then seasoned with a tempering (tadka) of mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves, and other spices to enhance its flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Chettinad Chicken
items.description: A recipe from the regions of Chettinad in the South of India. Chicken cooked with onion & tomato and lot of fresh pepper making it a fiery and lip smaking meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Nai Appam
items.description: A traditional South Indian sweet snack made with rice flour, jaggery, banana, coconut and a touch of cardamom. The batter is poured into a special pan with small round molds and deep-fried until golden brown. (7 appams)

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Aloo Chana Achari Pulao
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that combines potatoes (aloo), chickpeas (chana), and pickling spices (achari) to create a delicious one-pot meal. Served with raita + sidesalad + achar.

items.name: Bohri Chicken Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic biryani preparation that originates from the Bohra Muslim community in India. It features marinated chicken cooked with fragrant spices, herbs, and yogurt, layered with partially cooked basmati rice. The layers are then  dum-cooked to allow the flavors to meld. Bohri biryani  incorporates unique spices and condiments, such as dried plums (aloo bukhara), fried onions, and a special blend of masalas, giving it a distinctive taste. The result is a delicious and well-spiced chicken biryani, enjoyed for its rich flavors and cultural significance.

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamarind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan and onions

items.name: Veg Pot Rice
items.description: A wholesome and nutritious dish made with a variety of colorful vegetables, fragrant rice, and aromatic spices, all cooked together in a single pot, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying vegetarian meal

items.name: Chicken Pot Rice
items.description: A one-pot meal that combines succulent chicken, fragrant rice, and a medley of vegetables, cooked together in a flavorful broth, resulting in a hearty and satisfying dish.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Drums of Heaven
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese appetizer, showcasing crispy deep-fried chicken wings coated in a tangy and savory sauce. Known for its succulent texture and bold flavors, it is a delightful dish enjoyed for its unique fusion of Chinese and Indian culinary influences.
